MAN.TITLE: etl_scicos_el5001

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: Master-ID of the Master Interface. Has to be zero or an positive integer.
Working Domain ID for the working slave. Default zero or an positive integer.
Alternative slave addressing possibill√≠ty, see Slave Position. Zero or an positive 16 Bit integer.
Slave position in the ethercat bus. Zero or an positive integer
Enable Status Output for special type of Slaves. For further Information please read the Beckhoff Slave Documentation.
For further Information please read the Beckhoff Slave Documentation.

DESCRIPTION.P: This Block represents an EL5001 Beckhoff EtherCAT Slave. You can access Fieldbus IO during Simulation and after Codegeneration in standalone running mode
